articles.author: Sarah Carter, Tucker Reals
articles.title: Israel faces accusation of genocide against Palestinians in Gaza in case brought by South Africa at U.N. court - CBS News
articles.description: Israel says a case brought by South Africa accusing it of genocide in the Gaza war is "preposterous." Here's a look at the case, the court, and the crime of genocide.
articles.content: Israel is facing a trial at the United Nations' International Court of Justice, accused of committing the crime of genocide with its ongoing military operation against Hamas in the Gaza Strip. On Dec… [+7853 chars]
